    April 2024: Megan Adler awarded NSF GRFP

    Graduate student Megan Adler received the prestigius NSF GRFP award to continue her work in the Shahid lab on chromatin regulation in Cuscuta-host interaction! Megan was the sole awardee from Oklahoma State University for the 2024 GRFP cycle. Read more about Megan’s achievment here.
